title: Heineken to slash up to 6,000 jobs in AI 'productivity savings' amid slump in beer sales
summary_full: Heineken's CEO told CNBC that AI will play an "important part of ongoing productivity savings" after the brewer said it plans to cut up to 7% of its workforce.
summary_public: Heineken's CEO told CNBC that AI will play an "important part of ongoing productivity savings" after the brewer said it plans to cut up to 7% of its workforce.
